channel.title: Offical Client
channel.description: It is currently: [code] ClientRequired=0 WorldId=3 ServerPort=43594 [/code] When I make my: [code] ClientRequired=1 WorldId=3 ServerPort=43594 [/code] It says I need to download the new client, But the want it to work like that. Heres what it says when you try connecting with it on =1 [code]if(k == 12) { aString1266 = "The Client you are using is out of date"; aString1267 = "Download the newest client at www.*********.net"; return; } [/code]

item.title: Offical Client
item.dc:creator: @Pblord7 Pblord7
item.description:
@Pblord7 wrote:

[quote=“EmulousGuru, post:2, topic:364117”]The ClientRequired initiates the UID variable.

The server is looking for a UID, which the client is not providing correctly.[/quote]

How do I change it?

Read full topic

item.title: Offical Client

item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

The ClientRequired initiates the UID variable.

The server is looking for a UID, which the client is not providing correctly.

item.title: Offical Client
item.dc:creator: @Pblord7 Pblord7
item.description:
@Pblord7 wrote:

It is currently:

ClientRequired=0
WorldId=3
ServerPort=43594

When I make my:

ClientRequired=1
WorldId=3
ServerPort=43594

It says I need to download the new client, But the want it to work like that.
Heres what it says when you try connecting with it on =1

if(k == 12) { aString1266 = "The Client you are using is out of date"; aString1267 = "Download the newest client at www.*********.net"; return; }

Read full topic
